jobDescription:
Inventory specialist
Inventory Specialist will be responsible for keeping track of product keeping all inventory organized, preparing and packaging product for sales, and making sure inventory is reported correctly. Our current position is in Beaverton. 

Requirements:
*Must have OLCC Marijuana Workers Permit
*Have excellent communication skills
*Have a strong knowledge of and passion for the industry
* Greenbits experience desired, but willing to train if you have POS experience
* 21 years of age
*High School Diploma
*Ensure store cleanliness
*Have strong computer skills
*Reliable Transportation
*Able to work nights (until 10 pm), weekends and holidays (flexible hours/availability, willing to cover shifts)
*Must be reliable and honest, tardiness and absents for shifts is not tolerated
*Must be able to pass a criminal background check

Duties Include: 
• Weighing and distributing product 
• Keeping track of product along with promoting product and keeping inventory balanced
• Keeping inventory organized 
• Packaging product and preparing for sale.
jobApplication: Please send a resume and qualifications to employment@thegreenplanet.co

jobDescription:
Releaf Society LLC is currently hiring for the following positions: 

Trim Team Specialist.
Harvest Helpers

Compensation: $15-$20/hour 
Paid Weekly 

Requirements: 
Minimum of (1) year experience of cannabis production preferred.
Marijuana Workers Permit preferred, but not required to start........Go to oregon.gov to apply
Reliable transportation to/from the job site
TrimTools (Fiskars/Trim tray)
*Pass background check

Here's the rundown...8-hour shifts are required, No half days are allowed. All Team Members are expected to be punctual, professional and maintain strong work ethic 100% of the time. No drama allowed.

We have accounts all over Oregon so if you need to relocate w/ can help keep you busy. We understand that some of our Team Members have kids/family/prior obligations. As far as scheduling, We are very flexible. You just let us know the days you're available or need off and we will adjust the schedule accordingly. We have plenty of active accounts in the area with many jobs running well into 2018.

If you meet all the necessary requirements and would like to join the Releaf Society Team call (541)797-7935. 
Go to our website to apply. www.releafsociety.com


Check out our Instagram @releafsocietyllc to see what we have been up to around the state

Looking to break into the booming cannabis industry in Oregon? Do you have experience trimming and caring for cannabis? Weed love to hear from you!

GreenForce is an Oregon based, full-service staffing and temporary employment agency focused on labor solutions for the cannabis industry. We specialize in providing skilled harvesting, cultivation lifecycle, and trimming temporary labor services for licensed Oregon producers. Our founders are business leaders who have come together to utilize their deep and varied experience in the cannabis, beverage, healthcare, staffing, and financial services industries to provide much needed labor solutions to the burgeoning legal cannabis industry.

 We are looking for team players that are passionate about cannabis. Any of these qualities sound like you?

 - Live in Oregon
- Must have begun OLCC Marijuana Worker Permit process*
- Must be organized and maintain a clean work space
- Ability to follow standard operation procedures
- Ability to sit for long periods of time
- Reliable transportation
- Flexible Schedule

*OLCC permit is required before any placement can occur. It can take 3-5 weeks, so it is strongly recommended that you start the process early. If you do not have one, please apply HERE: http://www.oregon.gov/olcc/marijuana/Pages/mjworkerpermit.aspx

 Applications MUST be submitted via our portal listed here: http://greenforce.crelate.com/portal/job/zhzbctalmyu-444599

Check out our website: https://www.greenforcestaffing.com

Follow us on social media: https://www.facebook.com/GreenforceOregon/

 GreenForce Staffing is an equal opportunity employer. GreenForce Staffing will not discriminate and will take measures to ensure against discrimination in employment, recruitment, advertisements for employment, compensation, termination, upgrading, promotions, and other conditions of employment against any employee or job applicant on the bases of race, creed, color, sexual orientation, national origin, or sex.
jobApplication: Please visit https://greenforce.crelate.com/portal for all our job openings.

jobDescription:
ROGUE STAFFING IS NOW HIRING Cannabis trimmers and harvest workers that are prepared to start work as soon as possible!! OVER 200 OPEN POSITIONS

Position Duties
-Employees must be able to adapt to various strains, styles and types of marijuana they are trimming, adjusting their techniques to maintain a steady pace and quality.
-Efficiently trims and de-fans plants (wet trim).
-Responsible for accurately weighing and recording all wet trim weights.
-Demonstrates accuracy and thoroughness in order to improve and promote quality.
-Works in a timely manner and strives to increase productivity.
-Occasionally required to trim off the stick once plants are dry.
-Responsible for maintaining a team environment.
-Employees must be able to work well with others, as well as independently. 
-Employee must be able to follow basic instructions
-Employee must show up on time for work every day ready to work, and must exhibit personal hygiene while processing marijuana flower and all other job duties as assigned.

Some of the qualifications we are looking for in trimmers include :
Trustworthiness
Strong work ethics 
Must be able to lift at least 50lbs and withstand the weather elements, 
Experience at a marijuana trimming job and knowledge of the marijuana plant anatomy is a plus
Ability to focus on task for a long period of time
Accuracy and consistency in trimming
Ability to accurately weigh and measure

401 CRATER LAKE AVE, MEDFORD OR 97504
ROGUE STAFFING, INC.

jobDescription:
Mobile Cannabis Solutions is a cannabis farm staffing agency looking for RELIABLE full AND part-time employees! 
We offer flexibility and competitive industry pay rates. 

NOW HIRING FARM AND TRIM CREWS NOW! 


**COME FILL OUT HIRE PAPERWORK AND INTERVIEW THIS FRIDAY AND SATURDAY OCTOBER 27TH and 28TH!!**
WE ARE HIRING FRIDAY FROM 5:30PM-7PM AND SATURDAY FROM 3PM-4:30PM
COME MEET US AT 828 SOUTH CENTRAL AVENUE #7 MEDFORD OREGON 97501 



What you will need to fill out hire paperwork: 
Must have taken OLCC test http://www.oregon.gov/olcc/marijuana/Pages/mjworkerpermit.aspx
Bring a copy of the certified OLCC processing email stating a reference number
A pen
Readiness to interview and work 




Can you do outdoor labor?
Then farm work is for you!

Want to learn how to be a skilled trimmer?
We can help you learn how to trim.
You may be better at it than you think!

We work with multiple farms throughout Jackson and Josephine Counties, most often times, simultaneously. This gives you a selection of positions, and locations, to select from. 

Positions available: 
Immediate openings for Trim work and Farm work/Harvest
Additionally, we are staffing now for our Williams area

If you dont have your OLCC permit but would like to so you can join our team please follow the link below;
Click on the link below to get certified!! 

http://www.oregon.gov/olcc/marijuana/Pages/mjworkerpermit.aspx


Requirements:

Must be 21

• Must have taken and passed OLCC test and submitted your permit application (Please see link above to go through that quick and easy process)
• Must be punctual
• Must have a strong work ethic
• Must have a positive attitude
• Must work well in a team environment


Physical requirements:

•Must be able to trim -OR- do farm labor for 8+hours
• Must be able to sit, stand, and lift for long periods of time 


Position description for trim work: 

If you're new to the industry DON'T WORRY!! WE WILL TRAIN YOU!!

• Trim staff will be responsible for big leafing and dry trimming plants
• Responsible for moving/ hanging of plants, collecting waste plant matter, and properly disposing of dirt
• Separate and organize trimmed product into specific containers for bud, trim, stems, fan etc.
• Weigh and record information regarding trimmed plant material 
• Responsible for following operational and company guidelines 
• Ability to listen and communicate with other trim staff and management 
• Work in a quick and efficient manner while still being able to meet quality standards
• Maintain a clean and organized work environment
• Develop basic knowledge of strain characteristics and main problems with plants during harvest process
• Responsible for end of clean up of trim room, break room, and bathrooms and grow tables
• Abide by scheduling policies, show up on time for scheduled shifts, and request time off in accordance with company policy

PLUSES:
We do car pool to farms, but it is a plus if you have transportation (especially if you're willing and able to share in car pooling) 
Some experience in the cannabis industry is a plus as well.


Employees are paid weekly


As trim or farm staff, you will be directed to client locations and work to harvest their crop. This is a team environment so cooperation and friendliness are key. You will see various techniques and trim styles because we customize our services to each clients individual needs.
Again, WE WILL TRAIN YOU!

Mobile Cannabis Solutions
541-326-1643 between 9:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M. 7 days a week

NOW HIRING FARM AND TRIM CREWS
jobApplication: Meet us to fill out hire paperwork
jobCompensation: $14 a hour for Farm Labor. $127 a pound for dry trim

jobDescription:
We are currently looking for friendly, compassionate and reliable individuals to join our Team! Previous MMJ experience is a plus but not required. Willing to train the right candidate.


Qualities we are looking for:


- Having reliable transportation is a MUST 

- Flexible schedule (Evenings/Weekends/Holidays)

- Able to listen thoroughly and follow directions

- Outgoing / High-Energy / Able to represent different product lines for demo/ promo days.

- Good, basic comprehension of math (addition, subtraction, weights)

- Friendly, Personable, compassionate

- Organized and clean

- Attention to detail is KEY

- Good communication and problem solving skills

- Works well with others

- Honest, Dependable & Punctual a must !

-Must be able to pass a background criminal check


TO BE CONSIDERED FOR INTERVIEW YOUR E-MAIL MUST INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:

1. Tell us about yourself and your current availability

2. Attach Resume & Your contact information: email and phone number preferred

3. Must Submit 2 current pictures of yourself & IG/FB link 


We look forward to reviewing all applicants and are hiring immediately. 


*MUST have valid California I.D and medical recommendation. Part time positions available with semi flexible work hours. 

Pay weekly (+Tips- take home daily)
